event.title: parallel space multi accounts apk download latest version
event.description:
Parallel Space APK

Parallel Space is an amazing revolutionary Android app which will allow the users to sign in to two various accounts on one Android smart phone. This app helps those who are willing to login in to multiple number of gaming or social networking accounts at the same time by creating the separate space in the device.

By using this app, the users can sign in to one of their accounts via the app icon that is downloaded directly to their phone whereas the other one is via the app icon that is present in the Parallel Space app itself. Switching between their identities is possible through one tap, without having to log in as well as out of different usernames.

Features of Parallel Space APK

• It is a small as well as powerful app that doesn’t occupy more of your phone storage.
• Messenger apps: It helps the users to contact with different contacts in the second account.
• Secure: It will not take any unique individual user information.
• Gaming apps: For playing in two accounts simultaneously and to double the fun.
• Social apps: For sharing separate photos with different accounts.
• The app is compatible with most of the Android apps.
• With the long press, you can sort the apps.
• Several crash issues are fixed.

Get Parallel Space APK for Android

The latest version of the Parallel Space is available in the Google plays store for free and it is v1.0.3271. The app requires Android OS with version 4.0 or up. So, make sure to meet these requirements with your mobile if you want to install this amazing app in your device. After that download and install the app on your Android and enjoy switching between two different accounts or games as the same time without any hassle.
